Package org.opensourcephysics.tools

Class FourierPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • org.opensourcephysics.tools.FourierPanel

  • public class FourierPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    A JPanel that displays a plot and table of the Fourier spectrum of an input Dataset.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
